predicate.note: Frames file for 'cluster' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entries 22.3-2, 47.5.2.

roleset.name: (cause to) be in a close group

example.name: 'passive'
example.text: Instead of Japan's typical small homes clustered *trace* on narrow streets with no sidewalks, the new ``One Hundred Hills'' development will offer 65 houses on half-acre lots.
example.arg: on narrow streets with no sidewalks

example.name: with cluster, sorta
example.text: Prior to the introduction of financial futures in the late 1970s, most trading firms clustered *trace* around the LaSalle Street financial district here were family operations handed down from one generation to the next.
example.arg: the LaSalle Street financial district here

example.name: all args
example.text: John clustered his toys into a gigantic pile.
